content: crochet the perfect gift with these beanies using just single and double_crochet stitches you ll create cozy classic hats in sizes to fit everyone you love designed in worsted weight yarn the kind you probably already have in your stash this pattern is quick versatile and easily customizable try it in wool for warmth or acrylic for easy care with professionally tech-edited instructions in us crochet terms you ll have handmade gifts ready in no time gauge rnds 1-2 = 23⁄4 7 cm 13 double_crochet and 8 rnds = 4 10 cm
